parameters.name: DIAlarmRuleId
parameters.description: This parameter is deprecated. Use the Id parameter instead.

parameters.name: DIJobId
parameters.description: The ID of the synchronization task.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the alert rule.

parameters.name: Enabled
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable the alert rule. By default, the alert rule is disabled.

parameters.name: MetricType
parameters.description:
The metric type in the alert rule. Valid values:

*   Heartbeat
*   FailoverCount
*   Delay
*   DdlReport
*   ResourceUtilization

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the alert rule.

parameters.name: TriggerConditions
parameters.description: The conditions that can trigger the alert rule.
